text: @ScottPresler @CPAC You'll regret that when you have double pneumonia and any breath you take thst isn't hooked up to a machine is likely to be your last. I don't know who you even are or what this event is but trust me, just sit it out. A threesome with @rihanna and @emiliaclarke  isn't worth it.
